page.title: 20AMENITIES
page.content:
Situated only 4km from the town of Stranraer, the village of Lochans obtains most of its services from there including shopping, secondary education, medical treatment, most employment and even petrol. The list of amenities in Lochans is therefore very small and includes:_ {Primary School {General Store {Smithy/Agricultural Eng. Workshops {Public Hall {Pub {Playing Field with soccer pitch {Sewage Works
The village is also served by the Stranraer - Portpatrick bus service.2 services per day in each direction. The Stanraer - Drummore bus service passes through the extreme eastern part of the area, but not the village.
